description.value:
This augmentation enhances your muscles and nervous system to dramatically improve your flexibility and reaction time. You gain a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks. When you get this augmentation, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value.

Activateâ€”Engage Hypernerves f (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Trigger One of your reactions triggers, but you have no remaining reactions to spend

Effect You gain a reaction and immediately use the triggering reaction. You're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} on your following turn.
